name: 冒險治療研究
description:
An in depth analysis of the theory and practice of adventure therapy including its history, current status, and future direction. Students will be expected to facilitate groups using adventure activities in a therapeutic context.
To expose students to the history and systems of adventure therapy.
To allow students to have practical experience using adventure in a therapeutic context.
goals: 理解戶外技巧、知識與軟性能力與各諮商學派之整合模式
帶領不同個案之個別議題，有轉化處遇之能力
能尊重個案之個別差異，案主自決
堅守治療的保密與諮商倫理
遵守戶外生態無痕山林原則，並能讓不同意議題之個案與案家得到最好之處遇能力
